ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I gained a great deal of speaking practice, my vocabulary grew substantially, and my understanding of Portuguese grammar was significantly improved.
I really improved my portuguese writing
Learned new vocabulary, how to communicate effectively in Portuguese
I developed more dexterity in Portuguese.
I learned a lot of Portuguese over the course of this semester. In particular the focus was on oral communication skills. We also discussed a range of topics pertaining to Brazilian culture.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments:
Strengths - Interesting activities in class, interesting readings and homework assignments, and great opportunity to practice and improve the language

Weaknesses - Very few that i can even think of! It was a great class and Igor was great
The course was great. I really enjoyed. I just wish it had more music.
Maybe more grammar review, or more worksheets

I enjoyed the course a lot. I think it was a nice balance, because while the workload was never  too large, it was consistent, and being forced to sit every day and do a little bit of writing, reading, and thinking in Portuguese was really wonderful for my language skills.

I think the course could benefit from a little bit more of a focus on the culture of Brazil. The textbook we used was one that I enjoyed, but it focused on Brazil from a travel/tourist perspective rather than as a local perspective.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! Great class, not too much work, but definitely felt like I learned a ton. Take this if you want to keep practicing your Portuguese!
Yes! If you want to improve your portuguese, especially your written portuguese, this is the correct course to take.
Yes, its a fun way to learn a new language
If this class works for your learning style, it's amazing.

I would. I think the class is really helpful, and I learned a lot of Portuguese from it. Particularly helpful if you are interested in spoken communication rather than grammar. The daily structure makes up for the relatively low nightly homework levels. It is easy to underestimate how much time is taken up when you have something to do every night.
